bwwExcerpt: "This Broadway revival gets it. Bigtime. Under the masterful direction of Diane Paulus and featuring wonderfully energetic choreography by Karole Armitage, this is again finally a Hair for the ages, one that honors what the show's creators, my old friends and former costars James Rado and the late Gerome Ragni, wanted to communicate. With enormous help from Michael MacDonald's brilliant costuming, Scott Pask's versatile set that makes the cavernous Pantages stage somehow intimate, and Kevin Adam
